DOC.brief_title: Hypofractionated Proton Radiation Therapy Low Intermediate Risk Prostate Cancer
DOC.criteria: Prostate cancer . Gleason score 26 7 . PSA ≤ 20 ng/ml . Previous prostate cancer surgery pelvic radiation . Prior/concurrent systemic chemotherapy prostate cancer . Active inflammatory bowel disease ( Crohn 's disease , diverticulitis ulcerative colitis ) affect rectum . History hip replacement . Prior intrapelvic surgery . Taking Saw Palmetto methotrexate unable unwilling discontinue use radiation . Receiving continuous current anticoagulation Warfarin sodium ( Coumadin ) , Clopidogrel bisulfate ( Plavix ) , dabigatran etexilate mesylate ( Pradaxa ) , enoxaparin sodium ( Lovenox ) , aspirin/er dipyridamole ( Aggrenox ) .
